00038 namespace utility

00043                 void SimpleDateTest::BasicTest()
00044                 {
00045                         simple_date d2( year( 1970 ), apr, 18 );
00046                         IS_EQUAL( 18, d2.get_day() );
00047                         IS_EQUAL( apr, d2.get_month() );
00048                         IS_EQUAL( 1970, d2.get_year().value );
00049 
00050                         d2 = simple_date( year( 2005 ), jan, 31 );
00051                         IS_EQUAL( 31, d2.get_day() );
00052                         IS_EQUAL( jan, d2.get_month() );
00053                         IS_EQUAL( 2005, d2.get_year().value );
00054 
00055                         d2 = simple_date( year( 1901 ), may, 1 );
00056                         IS_EQUAL( 1, d2.get_day() );
00057                         IS_EQUAL( may, d2.get_month() );
00058                         IS_EQUAL( 1901, d2.get_year().value );
00059                 }
00060 
00062                 void SimpleDateTest::ExceptionTest()
00063                 {
00064                         THROWS_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 1581 ), month( 1 ), 10 ) ), date_exception );
00065 
00066                         THROWS_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2000 ), month( -1 ), 10 ) ), date_exception );
00067                         THROWS_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2000 ), month( 12 ), 10 ) ), date_exception );
00068 
00069                         THROWS_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2000 ), feb, 30 ) ), date_exception );
00070                         DOES_NOT_THROW_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2000 ), feb, 29 ) ) );
00071 
00072                         THROWS_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2001 ), feb, 29 ) ), date_exception );
00073                         DOES_NOT_THROW_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2001 ), feb, 28 ) ) );
00074 
00075                         THROWS_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2001 ), jan, 32 ) ), date_exception );
00076                         DOES_NOT_THROW_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2000 ), jan, 31 ) ) );
00077 
00078                         THROWS_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2001 ), mar, 32 ) ), date_exception );
00079                         DOES_NOT_THROW_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2000 ), mar, 31 ) ) );
00080 
00081                         THROWS_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2001 ), apr, 31 ) ), date_exception );
00082                         DOES_NOT_THROW_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2000 ), apr, 30 ) ) );
00083 
00084                         THROWS_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2001 ), may, 32 ) ), date_exception );
00085                         DOES_NOT_THROW_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2000 ), may, 31 ) ) );
00086 
00087                         THROWS_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2001 ), jun, 31 ) ), date_exception );
00088                         DOES_NOT_THROW_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2000 ), jun, 30 ) ) );
00089 
00090                         THROWS_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2001 ), jul, 32 ) ), date_exception );
00091                         DOES_NOT_THROW_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2000 ), jul, 31 ) ) );
00092 
00093                         THROWS_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2001 ), aug, 32 ) ), date_exception );
00094                         DOES_NOT_THROW_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2000 ), aug, 31 ) ) );
00095 
00096                         THROWS_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2001 ), sep, 31 ) ), date_exception );
00097                         DOES_NOT_THROW_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2000 ), sep, 30 ) ) );
00098 
00099                         THROWS_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2001 ), oct, 32 ) ), date_exception );
00100                         DOES_NOT_THROW_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2000 ), oct, 31 ) ) );
00101 
00102                         THROWS_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2001 ), nov, 31 ) ), date_exception );
00103                         DOES_NOT_THROW_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2000 ), nov, 30 ) ) );
00104 
00105                         THROWS_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2001 ), dec, 32 ) ), date_exception );
00106                         DOES_NOT_THROW_EXCEPTION( (simple_date( year( 2000 ), dec, 31 ) ) );
00107                 }

00110                 void SimpleDateTest::IsLeapYearTest()
00111                 {
00112                         IS_TRUE( is_leap_year( year( 1988 ) ) );
00113                         IS_TRUE( is_leap_year( year( 2000 ) ) );
00114                         IS_TRUE( is_leap_year( year( 2004 ) ) );
00115                         IS_TRUE( ! is_leap_year( year( 1987 ) ) );
00116                         IS_TRUE( ! is_leap_year( year( 2001 ) ) );
00117                         IS_TRUE( ! is_leap_year( year( 1800 ) ) );
00118                 }
00119 
00121                 void SimpleDateTest::DayOfWeekTest()
00122                 {
00123                         simple_date d( year( 2005 ), may, 25 );
00124                         IS_EQUAL( wed, d.get_day_of_week() );
00125 
00126                         // first UK lottery draw
00127                         d = simple_date( year( 1994 ), nov, 19 );
00128                         IS_EQUAL( sat, d.get_day_of_week() );
00129 
00130                         // A wednesday UK lottery draw
00131                         d = simple_date( year( 2004 ), dec, 29 );
00132                         IS_EQUAL( wed, d.get_day_of_week() );
00133                 }
00134 
00136                 void SimpleDateTest::IntervalTest()
00137                 {
00138                         simple_date d1( year( 1901 ), may, 1 );
00139 
00140                         date_interval di = 10;
00141                         d1 += di;
00142                         IS_EQUAL( 11, d1.get_day() );
00143                         d1 -= 5;
00144                         IS_EQUAL( 6, d1.get_day() );
00145 
00146                         simple_date d2( year( 2000 ), jun, 10 );
00147                         simple_date d3( year( 2000 ), jul, 10 );
00148                         simple_date d4( year( 2001 ), mar, 10 );
00149                         simple_date d5( year( 2001 ), feb, 10 );
00150 
00151                         IS_EQUAL( date_interval( -30 ), d2 - d3 );
00152                         IS_EQUAL( date_interval( 28 ), d4 - d5 );
00153 
00154                         simple_date d6( year( 2000 ), feb, 10 );
00155                         simple_date d7( year( 2000 ), mar, 10 );
00156                         IS_EQUAL( date_interval( -29 ), d6 - d7 );
00157 
00158                 }
00159 
00161                 void SimpleDateTest::OperatorTests()
00162                 {
00163                         simple_date d1( year( 2000 ), dec, 24 );
00164                         d1 += 365;
00165                         simple_date d2( year( 2001 ), dec, 24 );
00166                         IS_EQUAL( d2, d1 );
00167                         d2 -= 365;
00168 
00169                         IS_TRUE( d1 > d2 );
00170                         IS_TRUE( d2 < d1 );
00171                         IS_TRUE( d1 != d2 );
00172                         IS_FALSE( d1 == d2 );
00173                 }
00174 
00176                 void SimpleDateTest::ToIsoDateTest()
00177                 {
00178                         simple_date d( year( 2001 ), dec, 24 );
00179 
00180                         IS_EQUAL( 20011224, to_iso_date( d ) );
00181                         IS_EQUAL( 19990101, to_iso_date( simple_date( year( 1999 ), jan, 1 ) ) );
00182                 }
00183 
00185                 void SimpleDateTest::EmptyDateTest()
00186                 {
00187                         simple_date d( year( 2001 ), dec, 24 );                 
00188                         simple_date empty;
00189                 IS_TRUE( d > empty );
00190                         IS_TRUE( empty < d );                   
00191                 }
